Package net.minestom.server.scoreboard

Interface Scoreboard

All Superinterfaces:
Viewable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BelowNameTag, Sidebar, TabList
public interface Scoreboard
extends Viewable
This interface represents all scoreboard of Minecraft
